snippet: Big Boi, Ladysmith Black Mambazo and Calexico are among the acts scheduled to perform in Brooklyn’s Prospect Park series.
abstract: Big Boi, Ladysmith Black Mambazo and Calexico are among the acts scheduled to perform in Brooklyn’s Prospect Park series.

headline.main: Celebrate Brooklyn Summer Concert Schedule Announced
headline.print_headline: A Little Bit of Everything at Celebrate Brooklyn!
